long_description: partner with us today to ensure a mutually successful and worry-free tomorrow for all your logistics needs. hawkes trucking was founded in 1975 in litchfield, michigan. our continuing commitment to providing superior service at competitive rates makes us the carrier of choice for your company's freight needs. partner with a michigan-based trucking company that takes pride in service to country. our organization is completely owned by veterans who served in several major conflicts spanning 45 years. we proudly serve the needs of your organization with a razor focus on quality and commitment. our team specializes in safe, on-time delivery of regional dry van freight in primarily the service areas of michigan, indiana and ohio. pride in service to our country pride in service to your organization contact us today for your freight needs. we specialize in safe on-time delivery competitive rates and superior service when quality matters, we are the solution. if you have needs including dedicated or contract freight deliveries, same-day or next-day expedite service, r.g.
